attributes.action: call a general election once Tony Blair steps down
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the interests of democracy I believe a general election should be called when Tony Blair steps down as PM as I believe the premiership of this country should be fought for and won by politicians and not simply inherited as the labour party are proposing to do.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
